question:
Which among the following term / terms was / were added to Preamble of Constitution of India by 42th Amendment Act 1976. ?
  1. Sovereign
  2. Socialist
  3. Republic
  4. Secular
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The 42nd Amendment To the constitution resulted in the following changes in preamble:
  • Sovereign Democratic Republic was replaced by Sovereign Socialist Secular Democratic Republic
  • Unity of the Nation was substituted with “unity and integrity of the Nation.”
Thus, the three new words that entered into preamble via this amendment include socialist, secular and integrity.
